{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SorcBallPop}} '''A_SorcBallPop'''
(no parameters) Makes the calling actor go in a random direction. It plays the sound "SorcererBallPop" on the BODY slot, clears the NOGRAVITY flag, gives a gravity value of 0.125, a horizontal velocity between -5 and +5 on both the X and the Y axis, and a vertical velocity between 2 and 5. It also sets the calling actor's special2 field to 4.0, and its args[3] and [4] fields to 5 and 17 respectively. These fields are used by other functions called internally by {{Class|SorcBall}} and derived classes in order to make them bounce in a specific way. For this reason, this codepointer is restricted to {{Class|SorcBall}} and actors inheriting from it.
